title: What is the Royal Mail / Post Office Typeface
content:
Hello Typo's,  
I have been beating my head all afternoon trying to remember what this is?  
see an animated example here (its a flash ad)  
 [http://www.royalmail.com/portal/rm/jump1?catId=20900328&mediaId=65700705](http://web.archive.org/web/20120105005539/http:/www.royalmail.com/portal/rm/jump1?catId=20900328&mediaId=65700705 "http://www.royalmail.com/portal/rm/jump1?catId=20900328&mediaId=65700705")

If you could also recommend an alternative for marketing and possible signage  
for an arts organisation.

Love

Mr B
author: Mr Brown

comments.content:
[Available here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20120105005539/http:/www.type.co.uk/index.php?p=a_to_z&search=chevin)

Simon - It is not Royal Mail's own typeface, so you don't need an alternative.

Nick Cooke

Thanks to both of you.  
I was going mental.  
It's great we don't need an alternative

For both of us ;^)

Nick Cooke
